92.eng-name: Afflictions and the End of the World

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Sa`id Al-Khudri:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "There will come a time when the best property of a Muslim will be sheep which he will take to the tops of mountains and the places of rainfall so as to flee with his religion from the afflictions

chapter.eng-name: To stay with the Bedouins during Al-Fitnah
